education_text.0: After graduation, Goodfellow joined      Google as part of the      Google Brain Google Brain research teamGoodfellow is best known for inventing      redirect    Generative adversarial networks generative adversarial networks (GAN), using deep learning to generate imagesAt Google, Goodfellow developed a system enabling      Google Maps Google Maps to automatically transcribe addresses from photos taken by      Google Street View Street View cars                   and demonstrated security vulnerabilities of machine learning systems
